mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product A LEFT JOIN product_thumbnail B ON A.product_id=B.product_id WHERE A.is_delete=0 AND A.p_quantity>0;

SELECT A.product_id productId,B.img thumbnail,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,A.sale_voumn saleVoumn,A.point_rate pointRate FROM product A LEFT JOIN product_thumbnail B ON A.product_id=B.product_id WHERE A.is_delete=0 AND A.p_quantity>0 ORDER BY A.created_at desc LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row};

select A.product_id productId,B.img thumbnail,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,A.sale_voumn saleVoumn,A.point_rate pointRate FROM product A LEFT JOIN product_thumbnail B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id WHERE A.is_delete=0 AND A.p_quantity>0 AND C.cate_id=#{cateId} order by A.sale_voumn desc,rand() LIMIT #{row};
